pages.text: $(bred)Zomboni$() is a totally different life-form more closely related to Snow Gloem.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)130$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Deadly$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : it will leave a snow trail and temporarily turn surround water into frost ice.$(bred)it won't be cold or frozen or butter$().
